item.title: Who's Fernando?
item.description: I’m Fernando Paolo, a postdoctoral scholar @ NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory, Caltech. I develop algorithms for remote-sensing applications and large-scale data analysis, to study the Earthâ€™s changing climate… My full CV My NASA Profile My (useless?) Linkedin My code on GitHub Some Notes on code/software You can Contact me Short Bio I first became interested in polar/climate science during my undergraduate years while participating in an expedition to Antarctica for over a month.
